history.heading: Centrifugal separators having all of the following characteristics:
history.title: Centrifugal separators having all of the following characteristics:

supplement.heading: Supplement No. 1 to Part 774—The Commerce Control List

breadcrumbs: B. “Test”, “Inspection” and “Production Equipment”
2B352 Equipment Capable of Use in Handling Biological Materials, as Follows (See List of Items Controlled).
Centrifugal separators capable of continuous separation, without the propagation of aerosols, having a flow rate greater than 100 liters per hour, as follows:
history.text:
Centrifugal separators having all of the following characteristics:
One or more sealing joints within the steam containment area;
c.1.a. One or more sealing joints within the steam containment area;
Components of polished stainless steel or titanium; and
c.1.b. Components of polished stainless steel or titanium; and
Capable of in-situ steam sterilization in a closed state.
c.1.c. Capable of in-situ steam sterilization in a closed state.
